author: Joy20
title: Planning to visit jammu and kashmir in january 2016
text: India Mike » India Travel » States in India » Jammu & Kashmir » Jammu » Planning to visit jammu and kashmir in january 2016 Planning to visit jammu and kashmir in january 2016 # 1 Hi, I am planning to celebrate my birthday with my friends in Jammu and Kashmir but i am not sure where to go or is it ok to go in January (winter). I want to go to a place full of snow i have visited Manali and Shimla so if there are any other suggestion you are welcome. Thanks in advance.
